code: import CartTypes from"./cart-types";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:CartTypes.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItemstoCart=function addItemstoCart(item){return{type:CartTypes.ADD_ITEMS_TO_CART,payload:item};};export var delteItemsFromCart=function delteItemsFromCart(item){return{type:CartTypes.DELETE_ITEMS_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var setCartItems=function setCartItems(cartItems){return{type:CartTypes.SET_CART_ITEMS,payload:cartItems};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:CartTypes.CLEAR_CART};};
